system.sustained: The Psyker Rains force bolts on their enemies. Picking out a number of targets within range up to their Psy Rating for each round they maintain the power.  The Psyker makes a +0 Willpower Test to hit each target,                        dealing 2d10 + 3xPsy Rating Impact Damage to them. No target can be hit by this power more than once per round. This attack can be dodged as with other ranged attacks.
